# originalRequest

**Instance Property**

A deep copy of the original connection request.

## Declaration

```swift
var originalRequest: URLRequest { get }
```

## Discussion

As the connection performs the load, the request may change as a result of protocol canonicalization or due to following redirects. [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSURLConnection/currentRequest] can be used to retrieve this value.

## Connection URL Information

- **currentRequest**: The current connection request.
